Test.name: Source Code Lines
Test.description_component: Sum of actual lines of code, excl. empty & comment lines.
Test.example_component: For a total batch of 100 lines of code, with 10 blank and comment lines, an input of 80 follows.
Test.description_process: Sum of actual lines of code, excl. empty & comment lines.
Test.example_process: For a process with 10 components and a target value of 10,000 lines of code, an input of 1,000 lines follows.
